content.raw: nice, memory leak is now gone when playing back the `state.tlog` in [ign-gazebo issue 47](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/issues/47). I also tested with a short subt playback \(1:30m sim time\) where memory usage used to grow by >4GB without these changes and now they stay relatively steady.
content.html: nice, memory leak is now gone when playing back the state.tlog in ign-gazebo issue 47. I also tested with a short subt playback (1:30m sim time) where memory usage used to grow by >4GB without these changes and now they stay relatively steady.
